casebody.data:
STATE
v.
TERRIL COURTNEY BATTLE 464PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017

Mr. Nicholas C. Woomer-Deters, Assistant Appellate Defender, For Battle, Terril Courtney.

Ms. Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina.

Mr. Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for the State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of December 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
